author: Associated Press
title: Russians Have Olympic Doping Bans Lifted
text:
An international sports tribunal overturned the Olympic life bans of 28 Russian athletes, a boon for Russia a little over a week before the start of the Winter Olympics, where its national team has been barred from participating because of an alleged state-sponsored doping scheme.
The Court of Arbitration for Sport, an appellate court for sports cases, said Thursday that evidence it reviewed in 28 appeals by Russian athletes were “insufficient” to support accusations of antidoping rule violation. The court said sanctions against...
